hotels.vendor_name: Hospes Las Casas Del Rey De Baeza
hotels.title: Seville Dreamy Retreat in 18th-Century Spanish Farmhouse
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in true Spanish opulence with a stay in Hospes Las Casas del Rey de Baeza, a stunning 18th-century converted farmhouse. The aromas of orange blossoms will dazzle your senses as you wander the surrounding streets, soaking in the culture and history of the city. Retreat to this classically inspired resort and observe the city from above with a dip in the glistening rooftop pool. When evening falls, indulge in culinary delights at the Azahar Restaurant.
